title: Application
description: A person who assists in the creation of some project or resource.

handles.description: A list of the contributor's usernames and addresses on various platforms, such as their GitHub username, Twitter handle, and YouTube channel.

emailAddress.description: The email address which the contributor uses to interact with others involved in the project.

role.description: The role the contributor played in the creation of the project or resource.

links.description: Links to the contributor's personal website, social media profiles, or other relevant resources.
